title: Sensation
copy: Close your eyes and take a few deep breaths then feel the sensations in the bottom of your feet.

title: Sensation
copy: Close your eyes and take a few deep breaths, then place your attention on your hands. Feel the sensations there.

title: Sensation
copy: Close your eyes and take a few breaths. What are you feeling in your torso? Pay close attention to the sensations there.

title: Sensation
copy: Close your eyes and take a few breaths. What are you feeling in your forehead? Pay close attention to the sensations there.

title: Sensation
copy: Close your eyes and take a few breaths. What are you feeling in your eyes? Pay close attention to the sensations there.

title: Sensation
copy: Close your eyes and feel the entire surface of your back.

title: Sensation
copy: Close your eyes and feel the tips of your toes. Bring your attention back to the area if you get distracted.
